name: pushily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an unpleasant way, by trying too much to get something or to make someone do something : Helped by a pushily amorous waitress, he starts his own bakery, the Pie Company. She defines herself as a ballet mother, a term that was really invented for more pushily interfering parents.
